snippet: The State Supreme Court on Friday threw out the conviction of a man who pleaded guilty to criminal transmission of H.I.V.
abstract: Iowa State Supreme Court throws out the conviction of Nick Rhoades, man who pleaded guilty to criminal transmission of HIV; decision is victory to activists who say many states' laws are outdated and based on fear, not medical science.
lead_paragraph: The State Supreme Court on Friday threw out the conviction of a man who pleaded guilty to criminal transmission of H.I.V.

headline.main: Iowa: Conviction Thrown Out in Case of H.I.V. Transmission
headline.print_headline: Iowa: Conviction Thrown Out in Case of H.I.V. Transmission
